exceptions.tactic: apply (filterlim_locally_ball_norm (fun u : R => u <> y) x).
exceptions.exn: In environment y : R x : R_UniformSpace Hx : x <> y u : R The term "u <> y" has type "Prop" while it is expected to have type "NormedModule.sort ?K ?U".

original: intros y. unfold open. intros x Hx. unfold locally. apply (filterlim_locally_ball_norm (fun u : R => u <> y) x). intros eps. exists (mkposreal (Rabs (x - y)) (Rabs_no_R0 _ Hx)). intros x' Hball. apply Hx. intros Heq. apply Hball. apply Rabs_lt_between'. split. -
